"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dbf0d963687230eb060600#post_54dbf0d963687230eb060600
Sat on the couch and watched tv. We were arguing about The Avengers movie. He doesn't want to see Avengers 2 but I'm gonna drag him to it anyway. My grandfather didn't like the first Avengers film very much.
